page.title: 07Housing
page.content: The houses are varied being of all ages from half timbered houses of up to 500 years old to modern detatched houses. In the two villages of Eaton Constantine and Wroxeter there are small groups of council houses which are semi detatched and have three bedrooms. The modern houses have been built on individual plots and are mostly four bedroomed expensive houses. Some of the houses that are away from the villages are country cottages that have been modernised and extended. they were probably farm workers cottages once but have been bought for their peaceful surroundings and beautiful views. All the houses we saw were in good condition and well cared for.
